snippet: The federal budget deficit will remain over $1 trillion, the Congressional Budget Office said.
abstract: Congressional Budget Office says the economy will remain sluggish, with high unemployment, and that the federal budget will exceed $1 trillion in 2012 for the fourth consecutive year; says deficit will be $1.1 trillion, about $200 billion less than in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The federal budget deficit will remain over $1 trillion, the Congressional Budget Office said.

headline.seo: Under Status Quo, Deficit Would Decline, Budget Office Says
headline.main: Budget Deficit Tops $1 Trillion, but Is Falling, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Economy Is Projected To Remain Sluggish
